servinfo.title: Rear Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly

servinfosub.title: Disassembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Front Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:Front .

servinfosub.title: Assembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Assemble rear drive shaft assembly referring to Front Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:Front and noting the following points which are different from that of the front drive shaft assembly.

item.ptxt: Apply grease to differential side joint.
Install tripod joint spider (1) on shaft by using special tool with hammer, directing its chamfered spline toward wheel side, and then fasten it with new snap ring (2) using snap ring plier (3).
